title: A Sign of Unity!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Ah, your mini towel is so cute, Shioriko-san~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>This one? This was umm.... something that Ayumu-san lent me but ended up being my possession.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, back when I just entered the club, I forgot to bring a towel. She lent it to me then, but when I tried to give it back after washing it, she told me to “Keep it.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, it’s been your favorite since back then, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You have such a big smile on your face right now, Shioriko-san. But it’s kind of frustrating.... I want us first-graders to have something matching too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Can we!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You don’t have to be that surprised.... Of course we can, or rather, I would love to have something matching like that. You know, as proof of our unity as fellow first-graders! Why don’t we ask Kasumi-san and Rina-san about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Let’s! I’ll go get both of them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
